channel.title: Github on Pozibl - the art of the possible
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Pozibl - the art of the possible

item.title: Overture
item.description:
Customize the public UDF to extract data from Overture Maps.

Add the option to grab data from a polygon and convert polygons to points.

Over the past year we have advised on the development of the Fused Platform.

The Fused Platform is a data platform that allows users to access data from multiple sources and combine it into a single data set. All via using Python code that is already being used by data scientists and analysts.

item.title: Regen Ag Shade
item.description:
Build a new app to use anywhere to determine the shade footprint of a new hedge or solar installation.

This app will use the Fused API to determine the shade footprint of a new hedge or solar installation. It will be able to determine the amount of shade that will be cast by the new installation and how much sunlight will be blocked. This will help people make informed decisions about where to plant hedges or install solar panels.
